summary: This document is a brief email correspondence regarding the removal of an inmate from suicide watch and psychological observation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 16, 2019. It appears to be an internal communication about inmate status changes.

events.title: Inmate removed from suicide watch and psych observation
events.description: An inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York was cleared to be removed from suicide watch and psychological observation, and approved to be placed with a cellmate.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York New York 10007
keyFacts: An inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center was cleared for removal from suicide watch on August 16, 2019.
The inmate was also cleared for removal from psychological observation on the same date.
The inmate was approved to be placed with a cellmate.
The correspondence originated from a Forensic Psychologist with the United States Public Health Service.
The document date (August 16, 2019) is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, though the inmate is not explicitly named.
